data.event: The first settlers in this area arrived around 1815.

event.title: was set aside from the Town of Duane Town of Duane in 1858

data.event: The Town of Brighton was set aside from the Town of Duane Town of Duane in 1858.
Apollos "Paul" Smith arrived in 1859 and gradually built up a hotel in the community that bears his name.
The College now uses the land where the hotel once stood along Lower St. Regis Lake.
